original_text: Now Jephthah the Gileadite was a mighty warrior, but he was the son of a prostitute. Gilead was the father of Jephthah.
korean_text: 길르앗 사람 입다는 큰 용사였으니 기생이 길르앗에게서 낳은 아들이었고

sentences.original_text: Now Jephthah the Gileadite was a mighty warrior
sentences.korean_translation: 이제, 길르앗 사람 입다는 용맹한 용사였습니다.

sentences.original_text: but he was the son of a prostitute
Gilead was the father of Jephthah.
